TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingElementExtensionElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement
Public MustInherit Class BindingElementExtensionElement Inherits ServiceModelExtensionElement

Docs.summary: Enables the use of a custom implementation from a machine or application configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You should derive from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> class to use a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.
Once a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> instance has been created, a custom binding element is returned. You can use this in an application configuration file by using the <`add`> element and setting the type attribute to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> class, and the name attribute to the custom binding element.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object that represents the custom binding element.
Docs.value: A object that represents the custom binding type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override and implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement.BindingElementType%2A> property to return the type of the custom binding element this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> associates with the configuration system.
